title: The opinion of the judges upon the clause in the Act of 22 & 23 Car. II. Regis cap. 9. for giving no more costs than damages, delivered at Serjeants-Inn in Chancery-lane, London, in Trinity term. Anno 23. Ejusdem regis
author: Hale, Matthew, Sir, 1609-1676.
publisher: printed for William Canning, at his shop adjoyning to the Temple Cloysters,
notes: Signed and dated at end: Trinity term MDCLXXI. Matthew Hale [and 11 others] March 31. 1688. This may be printed. R. Wright.
Reproduction of the originals in the British Library.
